item.description:
Ocean State DragonBoat Club is actively recruiting new members for this race season. We practice twice a week on Wed. 6-8pm and Sat. 9-11am at the Mashapaug Pond, 361 Reservoir Ave, Providence, RI. We always enjoy seeing new faces and introducing the sport of dragonboat racing to new people. If you're interested please come down and try out a practice.

If you'd like more information please send us an e-mailÂ to info@oceanstatedragons.org.

We look forward to seeing you.

OSDB
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind the Ocean Sate Job Lot
item.name: Practice for dragonboat races
